Kinopio Blog

Card Counters

New Stuff

Jun 12, 2023

Add a numerical count to your cards for voting on ideas, to assign meanings like priority or status (eg 1 = x, 2 = y), or just to count things. It's a flexible tool for a muddy world.

Relatedly, you can now vote for your favorite features on the official Kinopio Roadmap

Implementation Notes

This feature was based on requests, feedback, and use-cases in the support forum. I love paving desire paths to make them easier for everyone else to walk as well.
